summary: this give 4 spells. they need master lvl destruction and 1 needs master alteration. they can all be crafted at the tanning racks. may be overpowered. WARNING MAY CONTAIN ADULT LANGUAGE.
descriptionHtml:
intense flames -  deals 40 point of fire damage leaves fire on the ground that does 30 points of damage to an target the passes it. the fire wall last for a long time. targets take fire damage for 30 second (I think). cost 591 magicka per sec base. takes 4 seconds to cast.

winters wrath - drains 30 hp and 40 points of magicka a second also deals 50 points of frostbite damage slowing targets. cost 274 magicka per second base 1.5 sec charge time.

hand storm - 80 point hp/magicka damage per second and 20 points of steam damage. cost 375 base magicka and cast time is for 3 sec.  

orb of death - alteration. a ball of light that paralyses target for 2 seconds on impact does 50 points of fire damage for 50 seconds. cost 700 per cast. 0.5 cast time.
author: byrnsy45
